title: Can I reappear for the 12th board exam by getting my drop subject biology? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Yepp you can appear for the improvement exam. A fresh marksheet, with the revised marks, will be issued on clearing the exam. In case the marks scored in the Improvement exam are not higher than the regular Board exam marks, the best of the both exams will be considered. But after applying for improvement exam you should also know this…. Rohit Verma's answer to What are the certificates we receive after taking the class 12 improvement exam from the CBSE?
